/* eslint-disable array-callback-return */ import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const BookShelf = ({Shelf, handleMoveToShelf}) => { const [books , setBooks] = useState(['loading...']); const [update, setUpdate] = useState(false); const handleMoving = (e, book) =>{ const shelf = e.target.value; if(shelf === 'none'){ setBooks((prev) =>(prev.filter(obj => obj.id !== book.id))); } if(book.shelf){ setBooks((prev) =>(prev.filter(obj => obj.id !== book.id))) setBooks(prev =>([...prev, book])) } handleMoveToShelf(book, shelf) setUpdate(!update) }; useEffect(() => { setBooks([...Shelf]) }, [update, Shelf]) console.log(books[0]) return (
